mapper.insert: insert into sc_setting_range (id, description, jiajianjia, variety_name, kind, `status`, pmid, `date`, review_type, create_date, adminid, review_date, review_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiajianjia,jdbcType=REAL}, #{varietyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kind,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reviewType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sc_setting_range set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiajianjia = #{jiajianjia,jdbcType=REAL}, variety_name = #{varietyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, review_type = #{reviewType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adminid = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, review_date = #{reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, review_id = #{reviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, description, jiajianjia, variety_name, kind, `status`, pmid, `date`, review_type, create_date, adminid, review_date, review_id from sc_setting_range where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, description, jiajianjia, variety_name, kind, `status`, pmid, `date`, review_type, create_date, adminid, review_date, review_id from sc_setting_range
select date,review_type from sc_setting_range where pmid = #{pmid} and kind = #{kind} and `status`= 1 and `date` <= #{date} order by date desc,id desc limit 1
select date,review_type from sc_setting_range where pmid = #{pmid} and kind = #{kind} and `status`= 1 and review_type = 1 and `date` <= #{date} order by date desc limit 1

select id, description, jiajianjia, variety_name, kind, `status`, pmid, `date`, review_type, create_date, adminid, review_date, review_id from sc_setting_range where pmid = #{pmid} and kind = #{kind} and `date` = #{date} and review_type = #{reviewType}
mapper.delete: delete from sc_setting_range where pmid = #{pmid} and kind = #{kind} and `date` = #{date} and review_type = #{reviewType}
mapper.insert:
insert into sc_setting_range ( description, jiajianjia, variety_name, kind, `status`, pmid, `date`, review_type, create_date, adminid, review_date, review_id) values
(#{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jiajianjia,jdbcType=REAL}, #{item.varietyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kind,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.reviewType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.reviewDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.reviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select id, description, jiajianjia from sc_setting_range where pmid = #{pmid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and kind = #{kind,jdbcType=TINYINT} group by description
